name: Tinmen Turmoil
description:
This game was my entry  to the  2013 Global Game Jam. The theme was Heartbeat.  It's    a multiplayer game where you have to collect the most hearts by moving around a maze.   However the hearts are only visible for a moment (during the heartbeat).

In the future, heartless robots destroy mankind. Realizing the folly of their ways these 'Tinmen'   yearn for love by collecting hearts, while desperately thinking that this will fill their empty souls.   This is a competitive four player game. The player that collects the most hearts wins the round!   Hearts are only visible when they pulsate and when you get near them. They are tricky to   find and only the best the best robots will 'get the love'. May the best robot win!
